benchmark_details.name: ElectAI
benchmark_details.overview: ElectAI is the first benchmark dataset for election claim understanding containing 9,900 tweets generated by humans and AI, annotated with a novel taxonomy for characterizing election-related claims.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To understand human- and AI-generated election claims and evaluate claim characterization and authorship attribution.

data.source: The data consists of tweets generated from social media, specifically curated from the VoterFraud2020 dataset and additional synthetic tweets created using LLMs.
data.annotation: A subset of 1,550 tweets was annotated using a proposed taxonomy to capture election-related claims.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the performance of various models for claim understanding and authorship attribution.
methodology.interpretation: Higher F1 scores indicate better performance in distinguishing between human- and AI-generated claims.
methodology.validation: Cross-validation procedures were conducted during the annotation phase.
